website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a treat to reward your best friend, chances are he will love these peanut butter beef hide chews. However, they can be messy.
pros: These treats offer a unique braided design with a peanut butter flavor that most dogs love
Treats are seven to eight inches long and made of high-quality natural ingredients
cons: The downside to the tasty flavor coating is that it can leave stains on light-colored carpet
Active chewers can unravel them fairly quickly

customer_reviews.title: Something your dog will love that takes awhile to chew!
customer_reviews.text: We have a lab who loves treats! It’s hard to find something that will last long enough to be able to eat a meal without those sad eyes wanting a bite of our dinner. I bought these for his Christmas stocking and he loved them. It also solved a problem of something that he couldn’t chew apart too fast. I would suggest these to anyone who would like something that would last awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Miller

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: I have these braided and nonbraided chews also. The other chews, she goes through in about 20 minutes. These braided chews are made in the US and keep her going until she tires and leaves it. It then takes about 4 to 5 days to separate and finish it off. Her teeth bleed at times onto the raw hide which bothers me, but my husband says its ok. (In put appreciated). We have her stay on her blanket, as they do discolor a bit. P
customer_reviews.author: nurse1

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend these.
customer_reviews.text: I had a Rottweiler and gave them to him and the product did not digest properly and I had to take the dog to the Vet were they determined it had gotten lodged in his digestive track and would not pass. Very expensive lesson and the grief and anguish the dog suffered.
customer_reviews.author: Duke

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves them !
customer_reviews.text: Keeps me pup busy when he’s home alone . He gets to chew and I get to not worry about him chewing my stuff . Win win .
customer_reviews.author: Mama Bear

customer_reviews.title: ... dog (28 lb German Shep/Lab mix) chews through these like candy. They are a great treat for him
customer_reviews.text: My dog (28 lb German Shep/Lab mix) chews through these like candy. They are a great treat for him. Only thing I would recommend is putting a towel down as the coating they use can soak into carpeting if that is where your dog eats it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and made in the USA
customer_reviews.text: Nice, large size and made in the USA which is hard to find and so important. I have a Golden retriever and two Great Pyrenees. Very spoiled kids...I try to find a variety of treats and bones for them that are made in the USA...Well, not one of my pups will eat them. I tried putting pnut butter etc on them with no luck. Good quality and great price for a pup that likes them.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Bohmann

customer_reviews.title: My Dog Enjoys It
customer_reviews.text: Stains but my dog loves it, and he is not a big chewer. He's a good boy for never had chewed up my stuff, but I am glad he could have something to enjoy. Although he lost interest after he took apart the braid, so it was more like a game/goal for him. Smart dogs are annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Great products
customer_reviews.text: Good replacement for bully sticks. I think my dog equally likes regular flavored ones and the peanut butter ones. One downside is the beef hides are a bit wet/moist so my dog has a hard time chewing them. I simply baked them for a bit. Overall great (I’ve ordered 7-8” and 6” before but I would rather get the 6” because there’s not much of differences between those two sizes
customer_reviews.author: TJ & Olivia

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves them
customer_reviews.text: Now that I’m pregnant these are the perfect distraction for my baby I want him to not feel like he’s being replaced and these take days to finish so they’re perfect to keep him busy.
customer_reviews.author: Maria is a Jedi

customer_reviews.title: Braided design lasts long, basted flavor a big hit!
customer_reviews.text: Great braided design our Lab loves, and lasts long. Beef flavor basting is a big hit too. Love that these are made in the USA; feel much better giving our girl a chew that was produced to solid standards.
customer_reviews.author: Barb King

customer_reviews.title: Great for dogs that chew hard!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to substitute for butcher shop beef bones because my dog's teeth are starting to get worn down from gnawing on real bones for 8 years. She really likes these. She's a pitbull so these don't last long (about 20 minutes at most as compared to several days with a beef bone), but at least she can't destroy these rawhides in less than a minute like other "long-lasting" chews I've given her. I'll keep buying these because the quantity and price are great and she digests these with no problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: Isabella B

customer_reviews.title: CONTAINS CARAMEL COLOR (CARCINOGENIC)
customer_reviews.text: The ingredients should have been posted. This beefhide is coated in not just peanut butter flavoring but also caramel coloring (possibly why they stain carpet, skin, and fabric). Some caramel coloring are carcinogenic and because the ingredients weren’t specificied nor the fact that these contain caramel color, I will not continue purchasing this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 130 Lb goliath rotti who regularly eats butcher bones. Got this to give him a little bit of variety but I wish I hadn't. Caused bleeding almost immediately after he laid into it, large glob of blood on the bone when I took it away from him. Split his gums. I figured he would have no issue with such a soft bone since he eats real bones regularly but I was wrong. This is a terrible product. Do not buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well, that lasted an hour
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this was finally “the one” that would last a few days but it lasted about an hour. She did enjoy it though!
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: I'm very satisfied with these dog treats
customer_reviews.text: I'm very satisfied with these dog treats. They last my german shepherd almost an hour each. They have lasted several days by taking it away after ~15min. I was going to buy more dingo bones but I'm glad I tried this. It lasts longer and made in USA is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Don’t give to Dalmatians
customer_reviews.text: Does not digest properly. I have three dogs two of them vomit the indigestible and the other had to take to the vet. Develop kidney stones because of the type of protein is made of.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Second purchase of these :)
customer_reviews.text: Does stain my dogs paws a little. He has white fur and the slobber and flavoring rub on to it, but I don’t mind- easy to clean and we have hardwood floors, so it hasn’t been an issue. He loves these and they do last longer than some other chews, so that is worth it! My pup has tummy issues and these don’t bother him. :) Also made in the USA- ummm yes please!!!
customer_reviews.author: Candy.G

customer_reviews.title: I’ll keep buying theses, and my dog will keep devouring them
customer_reviews.text: My dogs review: Oh Boy! More of those peanut butter flavored bones! My favorite! Oh boy! Yumm! As you can see, my dog loves these. I’ve bought them maybe 3-4 times. They’re thicker so they last a little longer. They can be a bit messy but mostly when he chews them into 2 or 3 pieces and tires to rest the wet, chewed up end on my lab as he is chewing the other end. No crumbs though.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: No upset doggie stomaches
customer_reviews.text: Dogs took to these right away. Our huskies didn’t demolish these too too quickly, but in a good way- meaning they lasted for a few days. I’m sure if they worked them all day long then it wouldn’t last a day, but we keep our pups busy and they play a lot so these bones made it longer than expected. The best part is that they didn’t get stomach issues from having these. That’s a win! I would recommend these for medium or large dogs only. They are big!
customer_reviews.author: edsjrs5

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves this!
customer_reviews.text: This is a life saver! I have a 17 week old German shepherd and she chews everything (except her toys). Busy bones last her about 30 mins a piece. I ended up getting her a huge femur bone that she chewed on for 2 hours and wasn't interested anymore. This is lasting forever!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: We have two dogs, our female is around 55lbs & our male is around150lbs. They both somewhat enjoyed these bones, and surprisingly, they lasted them, about the same amount of time. My big guy usually isn't very picky, but he did seem to get a bit bored with the chews. Usually, he'll take whatever we offer, happily, but he actually turned them down a couple times. Our little lady, on the other hand, Never turned them down, and she's usually much more picky. Overall, they were pretty happy with them, they didn't cause any tummy troubles or leave a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Lasts more than two minutes
customer_reviews.text: My 100lb pitbull mix will demolish rawhide in seconds flat. He will gnaw a 3lb bone to fragments if I let him. I got this treat more for my other two dogs, who actually enjoy a treat for more than two seconds. So I was very surprised when my pitbull did not disappear this treat in seconds. He's gotten one twice now, and both times they lasted for at LEAST five minutes before he walked outside to finish chewing (or burying) them. So I don't know quite how long it lasts, but it lasts longer than most!
customer_reviews.author: EddieAmazonTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not a fake review....
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love it #1. #2 they don't crap different. Thats basically all we normal people can say. We don't know how it effects their actual health. But for what they advertise, this product is great. I used to give my dogs normal rawhide. Now I only will give them these bones.
customer_reviews.author: @babygage2222

customer_reviews.title: Stains surfaces, dog not interested after licking the flavoring off
customer_reviews.text: My dog likes cator and pollux good buddy braided rawhides, so i thought she would love these. nope. after licking off the flavored coating (which stained her bed), she chewed on it for a few minutes then left it. Gave her a new one a day later, again licked off some of the coating, then didnt even chew it. Not sure why she is not interested in this brand since she loves the good buddy ones. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: kitkat

customer_reviews.title: My puppy doesn’t like these for some reason.
customer_reviews.text: My 6 month old puppy won’t chew these . He chewed the first bag. He started losing interest when the first bag was almost gone. He has no interest in them now, but he will chew other things I give him. Sometimes he picks one up, gives it a chew or two, then drops it and walks away. I wish he would because these are less expensive than bully sticks, which he really likes.
customer_reviews.author: C. Stone

customer_reviews.title: DOG APPROVED - WITH THESE 5 STARS
customer_reviews.text: 50 LB. BLACK MOUTH CUR AND 85 LB. IRISHWOLFHOUND LOVE THESE CHEWS. I'LL FOREVER BE THE ONE TO KEEP THE PET FACTORY IN BUSINESS ON THIS ITEM - 'CAUSE A CHEW IS GONE WITHIN 20 MINS IN THIS HOUSE. IT'S THE DIGESTIVE, NATURAL, AND MADE IN THE USA THAT SOLD ME. SO MUCH OF OTHER SIMILAR PRODUCTS ARE NOT. CAN'T GO WRONG WITH THIS ONE.
customer_reviews.author: Everett DeHart

customer_reviews.title: Not easily digestable for doodle
customer_reviews.text: My labradoodle had a very hard time digesting these bones. He had poop hanging out his butt like a sting almost. It was the weirdest thing ever. The bones are not very good at breaking down in their bellies. He loved chewing these bones, but not when it was time to poop them out. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn M

customer_reviews.title: Crunch Crunch
customer_reviews.text: Dogs love them. After giving them to my dogs, all I heard for a while was my dogs crunching away on them. The braid design made them last a little longer but not as long as I hoped for or other reviewers had indicated.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great beefhide
customer_reviews.text: My Great Dane loves these. It takes a little bit to chew on em. She likes the taste and the product is great. I think the price can be a little bit lower but fair
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Edwards

customer_reviews.title: For BIG DOGS
customer_reviews.text: This is a big braid really intended for a big dog...maybe 75 lbs or more. My dog is 11 pounds and when I order it I thought I could take it apart or break it in half but no it can not be done....well maybe with a chainsaw! LOL My dog likes it but is hard for him to handle and chew.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Quality bones
customer_reviews.text: This is not a bad product! The pup enjoys them, but only for a moment and he’s on to something else. I’ve had other braided dog bones that he would sit for extended time periods, these just aren’t it. I’ve noticed the quality to be different from those I get from tractor supply. I’m unsure if he will take to them for longer, but I am certain these are a decent product and someone else’s pup may love them
customer_reviews.author: Nikki delgado

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these things. She can’t wait to get one. She can finish one in about 30mins. I had hoped they would keep her busy for longer. The price on amazon is better than the store.
customer_reviews.author: Patty C

customer_reviews.title: My 3 dogs loved them!
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 aggressive chewers. One of my pups is 50 lbs, the other is 65 lbs, and I have a 260 lb dog. Yes, 260 lb ! All six of these treats lasted about 5 days. It is best to lay down old blankets for them to chew them on. The brown flavor coating turns everything brown as they goo it up from chewing. I used arm and hammer with oxi clean to remove stains from old blankets. It seemed to do the trick well enough.
customer_reviews.author: Naz

customer_reviews.title: My girl loves this chew-Review updated
customer_reviews.text: I like that these chews do not upset my dog's intestines. I can't tell that she has eaten the entire chew in one sitting and u don't have to stay up all night taking her out to the bathroom. Thank you for such a great product! UPDATE (8/25/2020)-I bought 2 packages a week ago and my girl vomited up the chew. This was done on two different occasions. I'm not sure if it was her or the bad batch of chews but I have her a different digestible chew and she didn't vomit.
customer_reviews.author: K. Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Not safe
customer_reviews.text: Not chewy rawhide like I thought. It cracked off very easily and was eaten in less than 15 minutes! A day later my did vomited. Not safe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Treats not chews
customer_reviews.text: These last 10 minutes, they're made up of very very little product. It looks like they're dense and braided but they weight less than a penny, thats how little beef hide is used in each braid. Not worth the money. I was trying to replace his rawhide bones with something nicer but this was a waste of money. They're treats not chews. I clearly wasn't as informed as I wish I would've been. Were going back to rawhide bones. My dog loves them and they last for days.
customer_reviews.author: amymichb24

customer_reviews.title: Choking Hazard!!!
customer_reviews.text: Choking Hazard!!! Not sure how these got good reviews. I gave one to my English Bulldog and if day 20 minutes later I was trying to get it out of his mouth. The braid came apart and there was only 1 last strand. Then he threw up the other 2 which he swallowed whole. I was watching him but didn’t realize the braid came apart. Won’t buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: mm5702

customer_reviews.title: These are for big dogs
customer_reviews.text: My little yap head, lap dogs like these but they are almost too big for them to chew on. They give it the 'ol college try, but these will probably last a VERY LONG TIME in my house..LOL! Good product though....the dogs love em
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Bertles

customer_reviews.title: Keep away from carpet and fabric
customer_reviews.text: The coating gets all over furniture and carpeting— this has got to be some sort of dye. The dog loves it but I had to quickly throw away after we got this. It gets EVERYWHERE, and good luck scrubbing to get it out.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Pioneer

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love these
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these things. They last a decent amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Jackson

customer_reviews.title: My dog didn't like these at all.
customer_reviews.text: I usually by another brand, but the picture and description of these dog chews was appealing to me as my dog is a very strong chewer, and I am always looking for chews that will keep him happy and busy. He tried one of these, and it took him days to eat it. I tried a second one, and he wouldn't even touch it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our toothy puppy is in chewing heaven
customer_reviews.text: After 15 minutes of dedicated chewing, the end is barely frayed. Our ridgeback boxer puppy is very serious about her chewing hobby, and isn’t interested in antlers or cow rib bones because they’re not destructible enough to hold her interest. We’ve gone through SO MANY animal parts trying to find one that’s digestible, attention-keeping, and long-lasting. We finally found it. Will subscribe.
customer_reviews.author: Savage

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my dog out of trouble for hours at a time.
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a 45 lb Siberian Husky and he loves these chews. I believe that these chews have helped save any number of shoes, belts, electric cords, etc. Yay for a product that satisfies my dog and keeps him entertained for long periods.
customer_reviews.author: Kymara

customer_reviews.title: Watch for carpet stains.
customer_reviews.text: Almost all dogs love peanut butter and my dog loves these chews. My only piece of advice is to make sure your dog doesn’t eat them on a light colored carpet or rug. His slobber will turn peanutbutter-colored and you will have to wash it out of the rug. I was able to get the rug clean.
customer_reviews.author: MIP

customer_reviews.title: Great value dog bone
customer_reviews.text: My pup loves this. It takes her about 10 minutes to finish. She has strong jaws so that's very long time in terms of dog bone chew time. The only negative is the color, she has white fur on her paws and jaw. When shes done with this bone, I have to clean her paws because they're all covered in brown goo
customer_reviews.author: Proud Mom 2008

customer_reviews.title: My Golden Retriever eats this..... very quickly!
customer_reviews.text: I can recommend the product for those who have larger dogs (75 lbs)....it's the right length too........just surprised how quickly my Golden Retriever can eat one, I thought one chew would last a day or two, or perhaps even an afternoon.....maybe Pet Factory representative can chime in if they sell other products that are *thicker* but *same length as these (7"-8")*...
customer_reviews.author: Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Great, but doesn’t last long with big dogs
customer_reviews.text: Great price! Unfortunately it lasted about an hour with my 100lb Lab/Rot mix. Great product though and my dog loved it!
customer_reviews.author: TrappedinMI

customer_reviews.title: Dog Loves - Owner hates the stain
customer_reviews.text: My dog loved this bone and carried it around so proud. Some bones she takes months to eat but this one was immediately gone. My only gripe is that she would bring it to my bedroom white carpet and the stain got everywhere. It was hard to get out
customer_reviews.author: Lela B.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy for your big dogs
customer_reviews.text: Chew unraveled, my dog had it in chunks which she swallowed and caused her to vomit it out in large pieces. Small dog ignores these.
customer_reviews.author: Jars59

customer_reviews.title: Your dog may not be able to chew it
customer_reviews.text: These were not good quality, my poor German shepherd had a hard time I went it and unraveled it, that helped for one but I don't have the strength to do it to all. Maybe this us a bad batch, they seemed cheap.
customer_reviews.author: medea

customer_reviews.title: Perfect chews for big chewers!
customer_reviews.text: We have a new puppy who incessantly chews. These are the only chews that keep her occupied for a longer period of time. Even my little pomeranian likes them after they come apart. One thing to watch is that they have brown “flavor” on the outside and my pup started chewing it on the white comforter and it got dirty, but it came out in the wash no problem. The enjoyment she gets out of them, and the time I can enjoy when she’s occupied is definitely worth it. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dogs loved them!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs loved these so much I had to throw them away because one of the (bullmastiff) dogs bit me when I got too close. She was the same with pig ears. Anything treat she loves she's like that. My point is, if your dog isn't treat aggressive, these are great!
customer_reviews.author: Edhat

customer_reviews.title: Dog's delight!
customer_reviews.text: My picky dog loves these! When he gets restless I hand him one and he lies down and gnaws for ages!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda J.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality Rawhide Chews
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent quality Rawhide chews. They did not come apart like many other rawhides will, therefore My dogs enjoy these rawhide chews tremendously. These rawhides last a good while also
customer_reviews.author: k9resqr

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Kept my dogs busy for a while! Didn’t leave much residue behind! Will buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Bellavance

customer_reviews.title: My dogs loved them
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these and there is no upset stomach after eating them. The only reason that I gave 4 stars is because it only takes them about an hour to demolish one. I was looking for something that might last a few days.
customer_reviews.author: trisha

customer_reviews.title: Depends on your dog’s taste - one loves it and the other doesn’t
customer_reviews.text: One dog (German Shepherd) LOVES these while the other (mini golden retriever) doesn’t. Just luck of the draw for what your pooch likes I guess! Giving four stars since one loves it but not five since both don’t love it.
customer_reviews.author: Analei

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs love these but the puppy could not quite handle them and had stomach issues.
customer_reviews.author: Kim L

customer_reviews.title: Great for Curbing Destructive Chewing
customer_reviews.text: These were just what we needed! I’ve got a dog who thinks it’s fun to chew on kids toys, walls, and whatever else she can find. I got theses to hopefully curb that, and it worked! She loves them, and even stole two others from our other dogs who just couldn’t fight hard enough. She did, however, devour at least two within two days...so, these may have to be treated more like a treat- she needs something that can’t disappear so quickly haha!
customer_reviews.author: Jalyn M.

customer_reviews.title: Yes, Thank you.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these bones. The braids have helped maintain their teeth and the "gumminess" when they chew them has not stuck to or stained my carpet. The only problem I have found it that they finish them too quickly!
customer_reviews.author: hlshagan

customer_reviews.title: Made my dog very ill
customer_reviews.text: My dog like rawhide chews. These were crispy not chewy and made my dog vomit and have diarrhea. Do not buy these 😡
customer_reviews.author: x54odin

customer_reviews.title: Long-lasting.
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these and they last several days of her gnawing on it (7 mo old Corgi). It doesn’t upset her stomach and I figure if she’s chewing on these, shes not doing naughty puppy things.
customer_reviews.author: Kathie Strout

customer_reviews.title: Dog isn’t a huge fan
customer_reviews.text: My Daniff will eat almost anything but he’s not a huge fan of these. He will pick at them here and there but barely. Unfortunately I’m still in the hunt for something to keep him occupied
customer_reviews.author: BCRush

customer_reviews.title: Dog liked them
customer_reviews.text: Dog liked them But they broke into a lot of smaller pieces. Made me nervous. Purchased the unbraided ones the last time from the same manufacturer. Pleased with those more.
customer_reviews.author: MME

customer_reviews.title: Not Safe
customer_reviews.text: You really, really have to watch your dog with these. My dog got the strands to pull apart, then chewed on the individual strands until they got really soft and then would try to swallow them. I had to pull several inches of wet, soft bone out of her mouth/throat so she wouldn't choke on it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny M.

customer_reviews.title: Will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love bones and we usually buy them from Costco because that has been the best price we found for them. We decided to purchase this to change it up a bit and we regret it. The flavor must not be great because our dogs hardly chewed them which is very unusual. They also stain horribly. If you have carpets, white beddings or white dogs be prepared to bathe and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph and Monica

customer_reviews.title: Dogs enjoy
customer_reviews.text: My dogs enjoy these rawhide chews. Have 3 dogs so need multipaks, these come with 6 so I get 2 evenings of quiet chew time. They last about a half hour which is pretty good for my super chewers.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: long lasting chews
customer_reviews.text: One package lasted my chihuahua mix 4 months! By that time, each big braid had been broken into smaller chews. Initially costly but over time, it pays off.
customer_reviews.author: P. Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last a whole hour
customer_reviews.text: 10 month old 40 lb puppy would go through it like it was a soft treat. Would start chewing and within the hour be done with it. It does stain the carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Akhil

customer_reviews.title: Leaves coloring on carpet
customer_reviews.text: My dog Loved these immediately. She chewed one up within 10 minutes. The bad part was that where ever she chewed on them, the coloring would come off and go on to the carpet. It was easy to clean off with a wet rag, but it was annoying to have to do each time.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Kaebisch

customer_reviews.title: Good but doesn't last!
customer_reviews.text: My Retriever loves these bones, but they only last 15 to 20 minutes. They are too crunchy and i've already returned them once. The first batch I received were chewy and lasted 35-45 minutes with me taking them away for a few hours or the next day. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Grateful Dog Owner

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these!
customer_reviews.text: My dog goes insane for these. She is a 2 y/o German Shepherd so it is hard to find things that will entertain her for awhile. These definitely keep her busy! #germanshepherdlove
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Black

customer_reviews.title: Works for large and medium dogs (see explanation).
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this product. I have three medium sized dogs (2 Teddy Roosevelt Terriers & A Large Min Pin) & a GSD. I take one bone and pull the three braided pieces apart for the smaller ones and give my GSD the larger one. Works out perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Todd M

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Purchase for Young Chewing Puppies
customer_reviews.text: These peanut butter chew treats were a bit hit with the jack russell terrier puppies. I would highly recommend and will definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Griggs

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Made in USA and reasonably priced. Dog likes them and they last a decent amount of time for my Aussie’s aggressive chewing. They do stain carpets so be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The chews last a LONG time, but definitely an outside treat
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful chews. They don't break apart easily, so choking isn't a concern, BUT, the coating on them gets EVERYWHERE. It gets on the carpet, the dog's paws, etc.; so, be sure and give the treats somewhere that is easy to clean or outside. Also, be sure to wipe down their paws after they eat them because the stain/seasoning is all over them and they'll track it in your house. I'll still buy them again because my dogs love them as an outside treat!
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: Huskies ate them too fast
customer_reviews.text: My huskies ate them too fast. They loved them, don't get me wrong, but not a long term chew. They finished in about 15 minutes. Maybe for a small dog?
customer_reviews.author: T.B.

customer_reviews.title: Dogs loved them
customer_reviews.text: I like that they are made in the USA and they seemed to be reasonably priced. My dogs really seemed to in joy these but they didn’t last more than 10 minutes each.
customer_reviews.author: hjean

customer_reviews.title: Happy dog would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Mocha my dog loved the treat the moment I pulled it out of the package. She entertains herself quite well with thus chew. So obvious she loves the flavor. I would definitely purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: rparellatn

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my dog happy.
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves them and they keep her busy for about 20-30 minutes. Ehich for a high energy, 60 pound aggressive chewer who's almost 2 is pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda Townsend

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love these
customer_reviews.text: Good prices on dog chews. They are not so hard that my older dog can’t chew on them. Keeps their teeth clean and breath fresh.
customer_reviews.author: D. Gebhart

customer_reviews.title: Gone is 10 minutes
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because they were rated on a dog site as a great treat for heavy chewers. Took 10 minutes for my dog to eat it all. They didn’t leave behind a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Lasts longer than other bones
customer_reviews.text: Pros are: my labrador loves it, lasts long compared to other bones. Cons: stains the floor, so careful where you let your dog play with it
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Easily Digestible
customer_reviews.text: Always wary to give my dogs rawhide especially from foreign origins.. These are made in the USA - dogs love them - no issues with digestion.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M

customer_reviews.title: Pet loves them
customer_reviews.text: Medium size dog loves them. Chewy can leave small stain on carpet when wet. It cleans up fairly easy if caught quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Wii Man

customer_reviews.title: My dog is not having it
customer_reviews.text: My dog wasn't interested in these. When this happens, he usually takes it outside and burys it, but he won't even do that. I'll be donating this bag to PAWS
customer_reviews.author: Cindy S.

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it. Stains fur. Lasts a few minutes for my Boxer/St. Bernard-mix.
customer_reviews.text: My dog, a 77lb St. Bernard/boxer puppy loves these, except they are not "long-lasting" as other readers have suggested. His white fur stains and he ends up kicking himself until he's red trying to get it all off. He loves eating them and one takes him less time to go through than his food bowl. I will not purchase again, as he needs to stay busy with something that lasts longer and doesn't stain his fur.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Bartz

customer_reviews.title: Great for aggressive chewers!  They love the taste!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs are addicted to these! They can chew on them for about an hour before it breaks down the braid. I have already ordered 3more bags!!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Moauro

customer_reviews.title: All of my dogs’ favorite treats
customer_reviews.text: These are my dogs all-time favorite treats. They get so excited every time I buy a bag and they’re safe for them to chew.
customer_reviews.author: Cadence

customer_reviews.title: Sick Dog
customer_reviews.text: These rawhides made my dog extremely sick and I wouldn't say she has a weak stomach. I would test out individual rawhides before buying a large package like this.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Very brittle
customer_reviews.text: Very brittle. The dog seemed to like the taste but the bits cracking off made me nervous that he would choke. I won't buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these. The only problem I have is it leaves a brown/tan residue wherever my dog chews on it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: Some dogs like it, but I think it's cheaper to stick to raw bones. But then again, I have many dogs to feed.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny A.

customer_reviews.title: Dogs like them
customer_reviews.text: I didn't eat these myself so I have no clue on the taste and since it doesn't get cleaned dumb question
customer_reviews.author: Achand

customer_reviews.title: Give them a try!!!
customer_reviews.text: Yes they're very nice very big big enough to share with my two dogs and yes I would order them again😋
customer_reviews.author: WALKER

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY MADE MY DOG SICK
customer_reviews.text: this product made my dog extremely sick with vomiting and diarrhea for multiple days! i would not recommend this product to any dog owner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Fur Baby Loves
customer_reviews.text: He took to these immediately. Actually gnawed on them and started hiding in the ground. Later on would dig them up....
customer_reviews.author: RADIANTSUNSHINE

customer_reviews.title: Good long lasting chew.
customer_reviews.text: It is rare that a chew will last more than a few minutes but these last much longer. The pups love them.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Must have for food driven, aggressive chewers!!!
customer_reviews.text: My Dogo/Shepherd mix loves these twists. They dont last more than a few hours but they are one of his favorite treats and "time passer's" when he needs to be kenneled. He's still a puppy and a SUPER AGGRESSIVE CHEWER!! These are PERFECT for helping curtail his natural furniture chewing instincts.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Wang

customer_reviews.title: This may be good for other doga just not mine
customer_reviews.text: My dog would not even touch them. She loves to chew but it looks like on only real bones. She is very picky.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Pet Factory 78128 Beefhide | Dog Chews, 99% Digestive, Rawhides to Keep Dogs Busy While Enjoying, 100% Natural, Peanut Butter Flavored Braids
feature_bullets: ✓EXCLUSIVE DOG CHEWS - Pet Factory Beefhide is 100% made in USA product. Beefhide braid chews are totally natural and very nutritious dog chews. These chews are easily digestible and very gentle for sensitive stomachs. The beefhide braids are of 7-8 inch in size and very safe as dog chews. This low-calorie treat contains protein and fiber which is literary best for dog's behavioral and oral health.

✓BEEFHIDE BRAIDS TO KEEP DOGS BUSY AND ENJOYING - These Pet Factory 78128 Beefhide chew braids are healthy, delicious and digestive. These Rawhides chews will keep your dog busy. They are made out of totally natural material making them digestible. They are the best alternative to any other similar pet chews.

✓MADE OF NATURAL INGREDIENTS – Peanut Butter Flavored Beefhide Braid chews could be a treat for the dogs. The Beefhide is a quality product; a strict GFSI food quality standard is followed in manufacturing. Beefhide chews provide unsurpassed quality combined with flavor. Beefhide chews contain unmatched quality thicker fibers that result into longer lasting chews. The Beefhide Braids do not contain any artificial ingredients and chemicals, as well as any preservatives.

✓MAINTAINS DOGS’ HEALTH – Safe, natural and certified product helps your dog in improving dental health through scraping away the plaque, controls tartar build-up and maintains gum health. Beefhide braid chews also meet the purpose of satisfying dog’s innate chewing urge.

✓YOUR PIECE OF MIND – This is a highly nutritious product for the dogs that can provide many hours of chewing experience and entertainment for your dog. Since the braids are butter flavoured that keeps the dog busy chewing the sticks and you are sure to not get disturbed by your dog’s activities if they are kept ideal. Since these Beefhide Braid chews are made out of natural ingredients they are absolutely safe to be used both indoors and outdoors.
